name: The Rise of the Machines
tooltip:
The Rise of the Machines

Venture to the Burning Steppes and recover 10 Fractured Elemental Shards for Hierophant Theodora Mulvadania.

You recall Theodora mentioning the golems and elementals of that region as being a source for these shards.

Requirements:
- Fractured Elemental Shard x 10
